abstract: The importance of story and the need to record it before memories are lost.
description: When Lorraine Ermacora's father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.
